body_html:
I met this problem before. Error log is "F tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_dnn.cc:220] could not find cudnnConvolutionBackwardData_v2 in cudnn DSO; dlerror: /usr/local/cuda-7.0/lib64/libcudnn.so: undefined symbol: cudnnConvolutionBackwardData_v2".
So I tried to update cuDNN libraries to the latest version. So I download cudnn-7.0-linux-x64-v4.0-prod.tgz then export LD_LIBRARY_PATH, it works. Thank you!
body_text:
I met this problem before. Error log is "F tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_dnn.cc:220] could not find cudnnConvolutionBackwardData_v2 in cudnn DSO; dlerror: /usr/local/cuda-7.0/lib64/libcudnn.so: undefined symbol: cudnnConvolutionBackwardData_v2".
So I tried to update cuDNN libraries to the latest version. So I download cudnn-7.0-linux-x64-v4.0-prod.tgz then export LD_LIBRARY_PATH, it works. Thank you!
body:
I met this problem before. Error log is "F tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_dnn.cc:220] could not find cudnnConvolutionBackwardData_v2 in cudnn DSO; dlerror: /usr/local/cuda-7.0/lib64/libcudnn.so: undefined symbol: cudnnConvolutionBackwardData_v2".
So I tried to update cuDNN libraries to the latest version. So I download cudnn-7.0-linux-x64-v4.0-prod.tgz then export LD_LIBRARY_PATH, it works. Thank you!
